meanings.definition: A small, painless lump on the eyelid caused by a blocked oil gland.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the chalazia on my eyelid.
meanings.sent2: She had to undergo a minor surgery to remove the chalazia.
meanings.sent3: The chalazia on his eyelid made him look like he had a tiny bump.
meanings.sent4: Her chalazia felt like a small pebble stuck under her skin.
meanings.sent5: The chalazia resembled a tiny pearl resting on her eyelid.
